name: Bonq
description: Bonq is a decentralized liquidity platform that allows any Web3 project to create deep, protocol-owned liquidity for their native token. It is built on a decentralized, non-custodial 0% interest rate lending protocol and a formalized, data-driven risk model. The platform is built, operated and governed by the Bonq DAO, a non-profit decentralized autonomous organization (DAO)
